== Kangod (603713) ==
      
Kangod is a village in the [[Siddapur ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 708.87 hectares and harbouring 448 households with total population of 1902 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[SIDDAPUR]] is at a distance of 7 km. Male population is 924 and female population is 978. Scheduled Caste Population is 161 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4. Census Location Code of the village is 603713<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 1379
* Literate male population: 730 (79.0%)
* Literate female population: 649 (66.36%)
